attributes.additional_details: Noel Fitzpatrick is the highly skilled super vet that has engineered his own designs to help save animals live and improve pets well being. With his passion and his team of over 100 truely devoted nurses surgeons and interns he has changed lives for pets and many people alike. Doing 18 hour days and living at the practice he devotes his heart soul body and mind to his profession and deserves reward for what he has done. Without his tremendous skills and love for all things great and small, this world wouldn't be the same without him.
